author: jerenkrantz
msg: * serf.mak: Link to the debug version of zlib 1.2.3 if we're in debug mode.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: Allow serf.mak to automagically determine if we need to link against
libapr{util}-1.lib or libapr{util}.lib and teach it about the ZLIB_WINAPI
define when using zlib's Visual Studio project files.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: Allow ZLIB_LIBDIR to be set to specify where the output of the zlib build
* serf.mak: Support zlib with MSVC 2005 builds.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: Add some polish to serfmake: adds clean, usage help, check and other goodies.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: Leave a comment about the MMAP failure case.
(serf_bucket_file_create): Leave a more descriptive note about why we fall
